vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to place, set, stand, set or station oneself, present oneself
1a) (Hithpael) to station oneself, take one's stand, stand, present oneself, stand with someone
Aramaic equivalent: ye.tsav (יְצַב "to know" H3321)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hitp.   tomar la posición de alguien, tomar el lugar de alguien
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (Hithpael) 將自己放置於, 站立, 持守立場
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (Hithpael) 将自己放置于, 站立, 持守立场
